> [scrubthesecond](#comment_62_1GgNo3CmxPd7n2pMSF3uyqf1XHvgtTUqCe): All these examples you've shown are minority incidences and are rare in Australia. As with the gangs, they're not exclusive to people of one background. It's not all doom and gloom like you make out.

I know that they're a minority of incidences. It doesn't matter. My point was that these sorts of things exist in western nations precisely due to multiculturalism. If we sent most brown people back to their respective homelands, or at least a considerable distance away from white people, violent crime rates in western nations would plummet. Racial tension would plummet. TAX RATES would plummet. Never mind the other economic benefits.

We really gain nothing from them, but they drain us of resources at mind boggling rates. Resources that could have been used to develop new and better technology or support white families. They make it necessary for us to have all kinds of stupid laws and regulations, such as, in the US, stickers on the inside of plastic boxes warning parents that they shouldn't leave their child in the box with the lid on because they may suffocate.

They create incredible pollution. I can't tell you how many times I've been in line at a drive-through and watched some African asshole throw their food and paper trash out the window, either at a wall or onto the ground! You know what I do when I have trash that I want to dispose of from my car? I PARK SO I CAN PUT THE TRASH IN THE TRASH CAN. Such a novel concept, I know. I happen to live fairly close to a black neighborhood, and the frequency with which I see large bags of trash either left abandoned or torn open and scattered along the highway is rage inducing. You'll never see that around white areas. Why? Because race is real.

Oh and their noise pollution too... Why do so many blacks and, to a lesser extent, hispanics absolutely have to roll through a neighborhood at 3am playing their bass loud enough to rumble buildings? Or anytime really. What even IS that? What possible reason could they have for doing that? And why is it not legal for me to rip out their stereo system if they're going to repeatedly show zero concern for people who actually need to sleep for work? Especially seeing as I've had my tools stolen out of my vehicle by these little hood rats, not to mention my entire vehicle stolen by an African on a separate occasion.

I can't even walk down to the corner store without being met with unprompted racial slurs and/or intimidation. No, it's not because they know me or that I'm rude to them. They don't know me and I go out of my way to be kind to everyone by default, on principle. Roaming packs of Africans just like to use that spot as a watering hole, so they sit out front and act like territorial baboons all day.

One of the worst parts of this is that the entire educational system in many white countries has been dumbed down to accommodate the average mental abilities and behavior of non-whites. So much so that a great many white children no longer even want to be there because they don't see a point anymore! Why should white children have to suffer for your utopian aspirations?

We need our own spaces, we need freedom of association again. I don't want my children to have to grow up in a multicultural nightmare. I don't want them to have to go through what I did.
